translations: 比赛中不被看好者；失败者；受压迫者；斗败了的狗；黑马

sentences.sentence: Capone was an underdog hero, a poor boy who made it big.
sentences.translation: 卡彭是个草莽英雄，一个飞黄腾达了的穷小子。

sentences.sentence: Most of the crowd were cheering for the underdog to win just this one time.
sentences.translation: 人群中大多数人在为那位处于劣势者赢得一次比赛而加油鼓劲。

sentences.sentence: "I identify with the underdog," he said.
